description:
T1 - Common Horse Chestnut
- Reduce all aspects of the crown by approx. 2-3m to create a tidy shape. 
Tree is approx. 12m in height and 4-5m in width. 
Tree after pruning will be 9-10m in height and 3-4m in width.

T2 - Common Horse Chestnut
-Reduce all aspects of the crowns by approx. 4-4.5m to create a tidy shape.
Trees are approx. 18-19m in height and 7-8m in width.
Trees after pruning will be approx. 15-16m in height and approx. 5m in width.

T3  -Common Horse Chestnut
-Reduce all aspects of the crowns by approx. 4-4.5m to create a tidy shape.
Trees are approx. 18-19m in height and 7-8m in width.
Trees after pruning will be approx. 15-16m in height and approx. 5m in width.

T4 - Common Horse Chestnut
-Reduce all aspects of the crowns by approx. 4-4.5m to create a tidy shape.
Trees are approx. 18-19m in height and 7-8m in width.
Trees after pruning will be approx. 15-16m in height and approx. 5m in width.
